title: Ep. 99 Underground King 2 International Star with Mr. Criminal
itunes:title: Ep. 99 Underground King 2 International Star with Mr. Criminal
description:
We sit down with Mr. Criminal and discuss his ascension from underground rapper, to million selling artist to International star. 

We discuss how he linked up with Wil Smith, his bubbling movie career and how he deals with the hood politics as a rising superstar

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
